verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* God \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1288"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*, “\w Be|strong="H1121"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H4172"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w dread|strong="H4172"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* crawls \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H3605"\w* moves \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* food \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*; \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w green|strong="H3418"\w* \w plants|strong="H6212"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H7431"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w its|strong="H3808"\w* \w lifeblood|strong="H1818"\w* still \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w surely|strong="H1875"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w require|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w or|strong="H1875"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w lifeblood|strong="H1818"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w shed|strong="H1818"\w*. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w demand|strong="H1875"\w* an accounting \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* takes \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* fellow \w man|strong="H5315"\w*:

Whoever \w sheds|strong="H8210"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* man, \w by|strong="H6213"\w* man \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w will|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H1818"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w His|strong="H6213"\w* own \w image|strong="H6754"\w* God \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* mankind.

But \w as|strong="H7235"\w* for \w you|strong="H6509"\w*, be \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w and|strong="H6509"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*; spread out across \w the|strong="H7235"\w* earth \w and|strong="H6509"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* upon it.”

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* God said \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w*,

“\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w now|strong="H2005"\w* \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* \w My|strong="H6965"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w you|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H6965"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H2233"\w* \w you|strong="H6965"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creature|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* livestock, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth—\w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w thing|strong="H2416"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ark|strong="H8392"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*: \w Never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w by|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flood|strong="H3999"\w*; \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flood|strong="H3999"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.”

\w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sign \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w making|strong="H5414"\w* between \w Me|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creature|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* come:

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w rainbow|strong="H7198"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w of|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* between \w Me|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth.

\w Whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w form|strong="H1961"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rainbow|strong="H7198"\w* \w appears|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w*,

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* between \w Me|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creature|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* kind. \w Never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flood|strong="H3999"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w whenever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rainbow|strong="H7198"\w* \w appears|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w between|strong="H5921"\w* God \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w creature|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* kind \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* God said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sign \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w established|strong="H6965"\w* \w between|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* creature \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.”

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w ark|strong="H8392"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w*, \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Japheth|strong="H3315"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

\w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w populated|strong="H5310"\w*.

Now \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w of|strong="H3754"\w* \w the|strong="H2490"\w* soil, proceeded \w to|strong="H2490"\w* \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*.

But \w when|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w its|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w became|strong="H7937"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* \w himself|strong="H8354"\w* \w inside|strong="H8432"\w* \w his|strong="H1540"\w* tent.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* father \w of|strong="H2351"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* father’s \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* brothers \w outside|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w Japheth|strong="H3315"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w garment|strong="H8071"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w across|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w shoulders|strong="H7926"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w walking|strong="H3212"\w* backward, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* father’s \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3947"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w were|strong="H8147"\w* \w turned|strong="H7760"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* father’s \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* \w awoke|strong="H3364"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* drunkenness \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w learned|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*,

he said, “Cursed \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*! \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* he \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* brothers.”

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* declared: “\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w*! \w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w*.

\w May|strong="H1961"\w* God expand \w the|strong="H1961"\w* territory \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w Japheth|strong="H3315"\w*; \w may|strong="H1961"\w* he \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.”
\w After|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \w flood|strong="H3999"\w*, \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* \w lived|strong="H2421"\w* 350 \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* \w lived|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w total|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* 950 \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.
